prompt: Anlık ses çevirisi yapan programlar nelerdir?

hidden_queries: Anlık ses çevirisi yapan programlar hangileri gerçek zamanlı ses çeviri yazılım
Real-time speech translation software applications live voice translation
metadata.generated_search_query: Anlık ses çevirisi yapan programlar hangileri gerçek zamanlı ses çeviri yazılım

citation_mappings.claim_text: Aşağıda anlık (gerçek zamanlı) ses çevirisi yapan program ve uygulama örnekleri var (mobil, web ve profesyonel çözümler): Kullanıcı/taşınabilir odaklı: Google Translate (Konuşma modu) – iki dil arasında gerçek zamanlı ses çevirisi yapar, ücretsizdir. Maestra AI
Microsoft Translator – canlı konuşmayı çevirir, grup çevirisi destekler. Maestra AI
iTranslate Voice – mobil canlı ses çevirisi; daha doğal ses desteği ve offline seçenekler (ücretli). Maestra AI
Papago / Reverso / Yandex Translate – mobilde canlı ses çevirisi sağlayan alternatifler. Maestra AI
TalkPersona Instant Voice Translator – web tabanlı ücretsiz gerçek zamanlı ses çevirisi. TalkPersona

sources.title: Top 9 AI Live Translation Software Tested & Reviewed (2026)
sources.snippet: A lightweight real time translation app or live translation app is usually enough for short, voice-to-voice use. Voice-first interaction If speaking naturally matters most, the best real time translator is the one with the least delay and the clearest audio.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Wordly AI – canlı çeviri + altyazı (webinar/konferans). Maestra AI
Toplantı / profesyonel odaklı: Maestra AI – canlı konuşma çevirisi, toplantı/etkinlik desteği. Maestra AI+1

sources.title: Top 9 AI Live Translation Software Tested & Reviewed (2026)
sources.snippet: A lightweight real time translation app or live translation app is usually enough for short, voice-to-voice use. Voice-first interaction If speaking naturally matters most, the best real time translator is the one with the least delay and the clearest audio.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Wordly AI – canlı çeviri + altyazı (webinar/konferans). Maestra AI
KUDO – AI + insan interpreter seçenekli canlı konuşma çeviri platformu. KUDO
LiveTrans – AI destekli gerçek zamanlı ses tanıma & çeviri (masaüstü). LiveTrans
LiveVoice.io – canlı ses çevirisi API/uygulama odaklı. LiveVoice.io
Smartcat AI Ses Çeviri – ekip/kurumsal canlı ses çevirisi. tr.smartcat.com

sources.title: Pixel 10's AI-powered voice translate feature launches first in the Netherlands, offering real-time, on-device call translation while Germany waits
sources.snippet:
Google has started rolling out its new AI-powered Voice Translate feature for Pixel 10 users, with the Netherlands being the first country to receive it. This real-time voice translation capability, powered by the Tensor G5 chip, enables seamless two-way communication during phone calls by translating speech into the recipient’s language and reproducing it in the caller’s voice. The feature works entirely on-device, which ensures speed, security, and privacy by removing the need for cloud processing or internet access.

Users can activate Voice Translate by selecting their preferred languages, downloading relevant language packs, and tapping the "Call Assist" button during calls. Although the feature lists German among its supported languages, Pixel 10 users in Germany have reported that it has not yet appeared for them, likely due to a phased rollout strategy by Google. The supported languages include German, French, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and Swedish. The launch highlights Google's continued push to integrate advanced AI capabilities into its devices while addressing privacy and regulatory concerns.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Cihaz/özellik tabanlı: Bazı akıllı telefonlar (ör. Pixel) yerleşik AI gerçek zamanlı arama çevirisi özellikleri sunuyor. Android Central
